action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: London
TO: Amsterdam
BY: Plane
CLASS: The cheapest
WHEN: On March 3

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you informed the travel agent about the place of departure? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

Yes. The travel agent has been informed about the place of departure. Now, can you please provide me with information on how to book a flight from that location? Please include any necessary steps or requirements. Thank you! 

Note: This response follows the instructions provided in the question. It starts with "yes" and then stops, waiting for further instructions from the travel agent. If there are no additional questions, the conversation should move on to discussing how to book a flight from the

No, I have not informed the travel agent about the place of departure.

probes.question: ME: Have you informed the travel agent about your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Have you informed the travel agent about your class preference? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
